price: 8. Tada Jis padarė jo palikuonis iš niekingo vandens lašo (vyro ir moters lytinių išskyrų).
arabic: ثُمَّ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُۥ مِن سُلَٰلَةٖ مِّن مَّآءٖ مَّهِينٖ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma jaʿala naslahu min sulālatin min māin mahīnin
